description.0: A keenly honed weapon forged from some strange crystal. Its faint blue light seems to whisper of countless matters now past.

0.0: Gain <cryo>12%</cryo> All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by <cryo>3.2%</cryo> per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.
